title: Waste Walkers v1.6.2
description:
Character Creation, Customization, & Progression
    Leveling System (Choose How You Progress)
    Dynamic Story (You Choose Your Background & Your Role In The Game World)
    Open World (REAL Open World = Do What You Want, When You Want, Where You Want, How You Want)
    Absolutely HUGE City Map Where EVERY Building Is Explorable (Every Thing Is Explorable)
    Chilling & Unique Atmosphere (Live In The Apocalypse)
    Diverse & Realistic Characters (All Characters Including NPCs Have Their Own Personalities & Customs)
    Realistic Hunger & Thirst System (No Need To Eat Every Few Minutes, Eat Every Few Game Hours)
    Face Constant & Ever Evolving Challenges (Enemies Progress As You Do)
    Background Story & Fictional Lore
    Decision System (Choices Affect Gameplay)
    Open Class System (Survivor Class = You Create Your Own Mix of Abilities & Skills)
    Random Encounters
    Field Of View System (See Only A Short Distance Around Your Character) (Be Careful)
    Random Title Screen Pictures, Random Title Screen Music & Random Battle Music (No Same Boring Tunes Or Pictures)
    Foraging, Hunting, Crafting & Scavenging (All The Popular Features Found In Modern Day Games)
    Light & Easy To Use Crafting System (Simple But Strong)
    Realistic Scavenging System (Find Things Where They Should Be Found)
    Randomized Loot System
    Beautifully Crafted Environments (Detailed & Diverse)
    Dozens Of Maps, Areas, & Lands To Explore
    Awesome Soundtrack (Dozens Of Tracks)
    Dozens of Different Enemies
    Open Environments (For Exploration & Realism)
    Excellent Combat System (Balanced With Advanced Functionality)
    Full Mouse & Keyboard Support
    Dozens Of Side Quests
    Random Events (Randomized Special Events Happening Throughout The Game)
    Skill System (Choose Skills & Abilities To Enhance Your Party)
    Day/Night Cycle (Constant Day/Night Cycle)
    Randomized Weather Patterns (Rain, Storm, Clear, Cloudy, Foggy, Dry)
    Hundreds Of Choices For Equipment
    Fully Equippable Characters (From Head To Toe = Instead Of Only 5 Slots, There Are 12)
